name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ntro.io Copilot - Stealth Assistant for Interview & Live Coding Challenge

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your private, secret, and stealth copilot for all meetings. Say goodbye to stress and failure — Ntro.io is here to help you excel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
==============================
🤖 How does Ntro.io work?

Ntro.io acts like your automatic stealthy ChatGPT in your meetings. It listens in on your meetings, identifying key moments when you should speak up. It provides you with instant, professional, and personalized suggestions to help you respond with confidence. Plus, it offers real-time translation to help you overcome language barriers effortlessly.

==============================
💻 Can I use Ntro.io for my job interviews?

Absolutely! Job interviews are one of the key use cases for Ntro.io. Gone are the days of struggling to remember everything or feeling unprepared. With Ntro.io, you get tailored responses to tricky interview questions in real-time, based on your resume and the job description. It’s like having a real-time personal coach by your side!

==============================
🚀 What other meeting scenarios does Ntro.io support?

Ntro.io is designed to assist across a variety of meeting types:

☆ 𝗝𝗼𝗯 𝗦𝗲𝗲𝗸𝗲𝗿𝘀: Prepare for high-pressure interviews with ease.
☆ 𝗥𝗲𝗰𝗿𝘂𝗶𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀/𝗛𝗥 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗿𝘀: Streamline your talent search with better insights.
☆ 𝗥𝗲𝗺𝗼𝘁𝗲 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗸𝗲𝗿𝘀: Stay on top of both regular and ad-hoc team meetings.
☆ 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘀𝘂𝗹𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁𝘀, 𝗦𝗮𝗹𝗲𝘀 𝗥𝗲𝗽𝘀 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝗧𝗲𝗮𝗺𝘀: Be more responsive and effective during client calls.
☆ 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗳𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹𝘀: Enhance the quality of your business meetings.
☆ 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗶𝗲𝘄𝗲𝗲𝘀 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗝𝗶𝘁𝘁𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗼𝗿 𝗟𝗮𝗻𝗴𝘂𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝗕𝗮𝗿𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗿𝘀: Boost your confidence and communication.
☆ 𝗔𝗻𝘆𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝗟𝗼𝗼𝗸𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗼 𝗜𝗺𝗽𝗿𝗼𝘃𝗲 𝗖𝗮𝘀𝘂𝗮𝗹 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀: Ntro.io helps you sound polished in any discussion.

==============================
🏆 What makes Ntro.io different?

☆ 𝗨𝗻𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗰𝗵𝗲𝗱 𝗔𝗰𝗰𝘂𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘆 & 𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗲𝗱: Ntro.io outperforms other meeting assistants in both precision and response time.
☆ 𝗦𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗰𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗮𝘁 𝗜𝘁𝘀 𝗕𝗲𝘀𝘁: No need to jump to another page. As a Chrome extension, Ntro.io works seamlessly within your meeting environment — just focus on the conversation!
☆ 𝗨𝗻𝗯𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗣𝗿𝗶𝗰𝗶𝗻𝗴 & 𝗙𝗼𝗿𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿-𝗙𝗿𝗲𝗲 𝗗𝗲𝗺𝗼: Get started with an unlimited demo to see how Ntro.io can boost your performance.
☆ 𝗥𝗲𝗮𝗹-𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲 𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 & 𝗛𝗶𝗻𝘁𝘀: Both language translation and personalized meeting tips, all in one place.
☆ 𝗧𝗮𝗶𝗹𝗼𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗔𝘀𝘀𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲: Receive hints that are specifically tailored to your situation, not generic advice.

==============================
🌎 What languages are supported?

𝗧𝗼𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝟭𝟮 𝗟𝗮𝗻𝗴𝘂𝗮𝗴𝗲𝘀: English, Spanish, German, French, Italian, Dutch, Russian, Portuguese, Arabic, Korean, Japanese and Chinese

==============================
🔒 You are top safe with Ntro.io

Your privacy is our top priority. We do not collect any of your personal information — whether it’s your resume, documents, voice recordings, or meeting transcriptions. Rest assured, your data will never be used for AI training.
